metas.name: Sherlock
metas.description: A modern update to the classic detective, blending mystery, crime, and sharp wit, similar to The Night Manager and HIS & HERS.

metas.name: The Queen's Gambit
metas.description: A compelling character drama with a touch of mystery and high stakes, akin to the drama in All Her Fault and the intrigue of The Night Manager.

metas.name: Barry
metas.description: Dark comedy with action elements, blending humor similar to It's Always Sunny with a darker edge like Brassic.

metas.name: Peep Show
metas.description: A British comedy known for its cringe humor and unique perspective, appealing to fans of Goodness Gracious Me and It's Always Sunny.

metas.name: Black Mirror
metas.description: A sci-fi anthology exploring dark and satirical themes, aligning with Love, Death & Robots and the sci-fi aspects of Rick and Morty.

metas.name: The Boys
metas.description: A darkly comedic and action-packed superhero show that subverts genre tropes, fitting with One-Punch Man and the darker humor of Rick and Morty.

metas.name: Parks and Recreation
metas.description: A feel-good comedy with an ensemble cast and heartwarming moments, similar to Ted Lasso and the earlier seasons of The Simpsons.

metas.name: Community
metas.description: A quirky and meta comedy with a dedicated fanbase, resonating with the humor of Rick and Morty and It's Always Sunny.

metas.name: Arcane
metas.description: Visually stunning animated series with a compelling story, blending action, drama, and fantasy, like Love, Death & Robots and One-Punch Man.

metas.name: Severance
metas.description: A mind-bending sci-fi thriller with a strong mystery element, matching the sci-fi and mystery elements of Fallout and Stranger Things.

metas.name: Dark
metas.description: A complex German sci-fi mystery with time travel elements and a dark atmosphere, appealing to fans of Stranger Things and Foundation.

metas.name: The Expanse
metas.description: A hard sci-fi series with political intrigue and compelling characters, suitable for fans of Foundation and the sci-fi elements of Doctor Who.

metas.name: Dirk Gently's Holistic Detective Agency
metas.description: A quirky and comedic sci-fi mystery series with a unique sense of humor, appealing to fans of Doctor Who and Rick and Morty.

metas.name: Fleabag
metas.description: A British comedy-drama with sharp wit and emotional depth, akin to the humor and drama of Ted Lasso and Brassic.

metas.name: Maniac
metas.description: A mind-bending limited series with sci-fi and psychological elements, aligning with Love, Death & Robots and the more surreal episodes of Rick and Morty.

metas.name: Counterpart
metas.description: A spy thriller with a sci-fi twist, exploring parallel universes and identity, combining elements of The Night Manager and sci-fi like Foundation.

metas.name: Mr. Robot
metas.description: A dark and suspenseful thriller with themes of technology, paranoia, and societal breakdown, appealing to fans of crime dramas like The Night Manager and the darker elements of Black Mirror.

metas.name: Upload
metas.description: A comedic sci-fi series exploring the afterlife in a digital world, blending the humor of Ted Lasso with sci-fi elements like Futurama.

metas.name: Midnight Mass
metas.description: A horror series with a compelling mystery and strong character development, appealing to fans of Stranger Things and suspenseful dramas.

metas.name: Line of Duty
metas.description: A British police procedural known for its intricate plots and intense interrogation scenes, fitting with crime dramas like The Night Manager and HIS & HERS.

metas.name: Inside No. 9
metas.description: A British anthology series with dark humor and surprising twists, resonating with the humor of It's Always Sunny and the anthology format of Love, Death & Robots.

metas.name: Beef
metas.description: A dark comedy-drama about a feud that spirals out of control, with the dramedy style of Brassic and the dark humor of It's Always Sunny.

metas.name: Reservation Dogs
metas.description: A comedy-drama with unique characters and a distinctive voice, appealing to fans of Ted Lasso and Brassic.

metas.name: What We Do in the Shadows
metas.description: A comedy mockumentary about vampire roommates, blending humor with supernatural elements, like Futurama and Rick and Morty.

metas.name: Russian Doll
metas.description: A dark comedy with a time loop premise, combining humor with mind-bending elements, akin to Rick and Morty and Black Mirror.

metas.name: Undone
metas.description: An animated series exploring reality and mental health, blending animation with drama and sci-fi elements, similar to Love, Death & Robots and Rick and Morty.

metas.name: The OA
metas.description: A mysterious and thought-provoking sci-fi series, appealing to fans of Stranger Things and Foundation.

metas.name: Killing Eve
metas.description: A spy thriller with dark humor and compelling characters, combining elements of The Night Manager and dark comedies.

metas.name: Ash vs Evil Dead
metas.description: A horror-comedy series with over-the-top gore and humor, aligning with the action and humor found in Rick and Morty and One-Punch Man.

metas.name: Final Space
metas.description: An animated space opera with humor and heart, blending elements of Rick and Morty and Futurama.

metas.name: Travelers
metas.description: A sci-fi series about time-traveling operatives with a mission to save humanity, like Doctor Who and Foundation.

metas.name: Orphan Black
metas.description: A sci-fi thriller about clones with a strong mystery element, blending elements of Stranger Things and The Night Manager.

metas.name: Patriot
metas.description: A dark comedy-drama about an intelligence officer, with a dry wit similar to Brassic and The Night Manager.

metas.name: Kingdom
metas.description: A South Korean historical horror thriller with zombies and political intrigue, blending elements of Stranger Things and crime dramas.

metas.name: Babylon Berlin
metas.description: A German crime drama set in the Weimar Republic, combining historical setting with mystery and intrigue, similar to The Night Manager.

metas.name: Bojack Horseman
metas.description: An animated series with comedy and emotional depth, resonating with Rick and Morty and Ted Lasso.

metas.name: Silicon Valley
metas.description: A comedy series about a startup company in Silicon Valley, blending workplace humor with satire, similar to It's Always Sunny and Scrubs.

metas.name: Atlanta
metas.description: A comedy-drama with unique characters and a distinctive voice, appealing to fans of Ted Lasso and Brassic.

metas.name: Invincible
metas.description: An animated superhero series with violence and emotional depth, similar to One-Punch Man and Love, Death & Robots.

metas.name: Murderville
metas.description: An Improv comedy with a crime theme where guest celebrities try to solve a murder, blending the mystery of 'The Night Manager' with the humour of 'Scrubs' and 'Goodness Gracious Me'.
